articles.title: The role Robert Downey Jr's drug-addict father played in sending him off the rails - Daily Mail
articles.description: Robert Downey Jr was born in Manhattan, New York City, in 1965 and raised initially in the bohemian neighbourhood of Greenwich Village. He says he was 'surrounded' by drugs at home.
articles.content:
